tariffStatement.generalRuleRefs: General Information Section 51, Arrears Relief Program (“ARP”) Surcharge

statementCharge.description: The following charges are applicable to energy delivered [all kilowatt-hours (kWhs) or kilowatts (kW), as applicable] under the service classifications listed below. See PSC No. 120 General Information Section 51, Arrears Relief Program (“ARP”) Surcharge, for further details. The Company shall collect the ARP Surcharge through the Transition Surcharge.

The following charges are applicable to energy delivered [all kilowatt-hours (kWhs) or kilowatts (kW), as applicable] under the service classifications listed below. See PSC No. 120 General Information Section 51, Arrears Relief Program (“ARP”) Surcharge, for further details. The Company shall collect the ARP Surcharge through the Transition Surcharge.

See PSC No. 120 General Information Section 51, Arrears Relief Program (“ARP”) Surcharge, for further details. The Company shall collect the ARP Surcharge through the Transition Surcharge.
